TextLibrary.Text: You have received a summons from the Ice Queen.

I guess, by the sound of your voice, that it's important.

A summons from Queen Ehlanna is ALWAYS important. You must go at once.

Fine, I'm going! I hope it has nothing to do with the Wood Elves and the Eye that I stole...
